reviews.text: Prices are not consistent, one Tuesday you are being charged $20 for lobster roll as part of promotion they run and the next one charge goes up to $30 for same promotion, not good for business brother especially local one.
I ordered roasted broccoli and potatoes but unfortunately, it was not like the last time, it was burnt and oily.

Second time here - was craving a grilled whole fish and they definitely didn‚Äôt disappoint! Fish was delicious , potatoes are to die for.. all the sides are perfectly done . Perfect spot for a casual seafood lunch/dinner with friends or solo . Looking forward to heaters for outdoor seating in the winter !

The food was incredibly delicious! The smell alone was so tempting that I started eating before I even thought about taking a picture ‚Äî as you can see, I was already halfway through üòÖ The grilled shrimp was dangerously good ‚Äî so juicy and full of flavor! Definitely coming back again.‚Ä¶

This place is such a hidden gem! The octopus + fish and chips are elite, lobster roll was on point too. The owner is also incredibly friendly! Highly recommend stopping by if you‚Äôre a seafood lover or just want some fresh drinks.
Is perfect and awesome restaurant and the workers very nice i loveee it ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

Not worth the price. First time coming here. The lobster roll was absolutely tiny for $32 dollars. Half the size of a regular hot dog.

Added: I did NOT receive any pickles or cole slaw with my lobster roll like you mentioned in your reply.  Came with maybe 10 fries. We came when you just opened up. We were the only ones in there. The person at the register spent about 15 minutes trying to figure out how to use the register to "ring us up"

This is my first time there and this is my honest review.
Great food, great service.

Took my fianc√© on a date here after learning about this spot on social media and met Muhammad. Not only was the food amazing but the customer service was off the charts. Mind you we were one of the last customers of the night! We had the‚Ä¶

Friendly Staff. When ordering the Brazino with veggies, it was about a 20-30 minute wait. The seasoning was great. You can taste the Thyme and Sage. The calamari and shrimp sandwhich was good as well.

There is a outdoor seating area in the back. While waiting I noticed many families came and sat down to eat.
Very good food Good luck
Excellent service, friendly staff, overall great spot!
They have the best fresh , yummy seafood plates ever üòç‚Ä¶
My favorite local seafood spot. Mo is the man and makes sure every meal comes out to perfection.
Great place to eat and pick up some seafood. üç£ They are also very nice.‚Ä¶
Food was outstanding, service was impeccable. Definitely gonna make many more trips to this place.
great fresh seafood i love it !!!
Food & service was great! üëç‚Ä¶
Everything is cooked to order with so much flavor. Not much space for inside dinning but the do have a few tables out back. Highly recommend that you try this restaurant.
Very great service food was on point not a long wait at all everything was perfect

I heard about this place from tik tok it's a short drive Ext 1 off the belt pkwy first off came on a late night food run.. Received the Greatest warmest welcome from the owner MUHAMMAD... The fish is fresh the portions are generous and the fish is extra crispy and well seasoned.. They have an amazing selection of fresh fish including salmon, the sauces to dip your food in and the lobster roll are to die for.  I got fish+tacos, fried whiting, shrimp, and calamari all of it came out excellent will come back again there is an outdoor eating area so bring a friend five stars will come back again. Casual friendly neighborhood energy environment.. MUHAMMAD THAT'S AGAIN FOR TAKING CARE OF YA GIRL üíú

This spot is a must try! Variety of fish available & steak. Halal. Everything from the starters to the sides to the entrees and drinks was top tier!! Food tastes so clean & fresh. Service 10/10. High chair available for infants.

The food is really good and fresh, prices are good and the guy working behind the counter is extremely  friendly, the seating could be abit better and more cleaner but it‚Äôs also not a resturant either.

Not a restaurant, just a fish/seafood store with a tiny kitchen, which was stellar ! The staff's uniform was super clean, everything was in order, everyone was wearing hats/gloves, etc.
Great food, poor upkeep of the eating area.
The backyard needs serious care and should reflect the care given to the kitchen and the quality of the food.
They food is really good & tasty definitely delicious I‚Äôm a regular customer everything is A1 lobster rolls,crab cheesy fries,cheese burger grilled calms,

We had dinner here today, grilled fish with veggies.   It was the best seafood dish ever which was cooked to perfection‚Äîflavorful, tender, and fresh. The ambiance was welcoming, and the staff was incredibly friendly. I can‚Äôt recommend this place enough!

My husband and I stopped in for the first time today. Restaurant was clean and bright. The owner (I believe that‚Äôs who he was) was so  friendly and helpful. Great prices. Amazing selection of fresh and cooked seafood, pasta and sides. And the kicker is that the food was absolutely DELICIOUS!!! We played it simple just in case and ordered fish & chips and a combo seafood plate with fried whiting, calamari and shrimp w/ fries. No regrets!! But next time we‚Äôll be exploring the menu a little more. Soooooo good. Fresh. Well seasoned. Perfectly fried. And the sauces were amazing too!!! I couldn‚Äôt happier and I‚Äôm so glad we won‚Äôt have to go to the other side of Brooklyn to get good seafood to go anymore. I‚Äôm looking forward to going back.
The food is delicious!!!! The people that work there are very friendly. We will definitely be coming back again and again
Trash the food was awful and the lady came and shut them down after my order. So disappointed because of all the online hype
This is sea üåä food best made.‚Ä¶
One of the best seafood spots I‚Äôve been to in a while I‚Äôm all of NYC , really good people working here & fresh food , prices are reasonable it will not disappoint.

Had a delivery over $100.  Food was delicious.  Great delivery service.
Totally satisfied my seafood cravings.

This place is amazing! Great prices for great options , menu is so big the options are hard to choose from , the menu and outdoor seating back area allows the customers to take time to find the perfect options, the staff are so kind and‚Ä¶
Amazing calamari and shrimp po boy sandwich.I highly recommend!! Excellent customer service
Good food and good service !

Very poor selection of  fish i.e. salmon , also when you need to pay , you are asked on the monitor to select tip amount ‚Ä¶ this is ridiculous, I am buying grocery not getting service at  restaurant‚Ä¶

I was in Bay Ridge last weekend while visiting NYC from SF.  It was the last stop on the NYC Ferry's South Brooklyn line and I lucked out and found this neighborhood gem that's about 15 minute walk from the pier.  The super friendly owner‚Ä¶
The food was 10/10 and the customer service as well !!
Absolutely Delicious ü§§‚Ä¶
Best grilled octopus I‚Äôve had in a minute. With bread and butter and a coke it was a deal at $20 too. Grilled octopus in a restaurant can cost $35. Sam was great. Really looked out.
Great guy behind  the counter  he knows  his stuff
Absolutely delicious fish restaurant!
One of the best fish restaurants in Brooklyn, and an important addition to our neighborhood. Delicious food and high-end service.
Amazing sea food, we had the see food boil 3 for $65 enough for 2persons...totally worth it, fresh, flavory and juicy....and great service, very welcoming ..
I have been going regularly since I found out about it four months ago. The owner is a good guy and the food is always fresh and consistently good.

Wasn‚Äôt sure what to expect but after seeing the high reviews decided to give it a try. Walked in and realized the place had limited seating BUT there is a nice garden. It was rainy so we opted to sit inside. Might only be about 10-15seats? The menu was a bit over whelming and there were fresh fish and live lobsters. We decided on fish and chips, mussels and fried shrimp bc we were no sure how to order the fish. Everything was absolutely amazing! Pleasantly surprised and the owner Mohammed was so friendly and accommodating. The mussels were cooked perfectly and we even got  bread to dip in the sauce. The shrimp was also delicious with thick cut fries. ( don‚Äôt forget the tartar sauce)  Next time we go we‚Äôll be more adventurous and try the fresh fish. Upon leaving  Mohammad even gave us some treats. Will definitely be back.
Number one seafood restaurant in New york city
Food was great. Service is excellent.  The owner Mohammed was fantastic.   Definitely a go to spot.  Shrimp linguine is must have.

This place has some of the freshest seafood. Came here for lunch today and everything was amazing! The whole red snapper was so good. Everyone is so friendly. If your by bay ridge this is a must try!!
Go!

I‚Äôve came here twice, and I must say this will be my go to fish spot! Their shrimp tacos is a must get! The Alfredo tastes amazing. We were a party of 12 and everyone was so happy with their order. They have meals for everyone, whether you‚Ä¶

Went today with my family and had a very good experience. We ordered Shrimp Tacos, Shrimp Linguini, Red Snapper, Steak, Burger, Wild Salmon and their Boil and everything was delicious. My biggest recommendation would be the shrimp tacos‚Ä¶

O man, what a delicious decision. Everything I ordered was Devine. The lobster roll was buttery with a taste of garlic, not too much, just enough. The snapper sandwich was not my speed of fish, but it was still absolutely amazing. I couldn't believe how tasty it was. The whiting was off the charts that's my go-to fish and they didn't disappoint. And lastly, but surely not least the calamari was great hot and once it cooled down. I tried the salt and vinegar fries them thangs were a different kind of good, and the coleslaw slaw was on point. They also have fresh squeezed juices, and they were also great in freshness as well as taste. The staff is amazing, very friendly. When I told them I came from Long Island, they made sure to point me in the direction of the restroom, which I very much needed. Most places don't like customers using their restroom. I will definitely be coming back here. To try their very opinion filled menu.

Absolutely fantastic experience at Bay Ridge Fish Market! The seafood is incredibly fresh, and you can taste the quality in every bite. The selection is impressive ‚Äî from perfectly cleaned fish to succulent shrimp and lobster. The staff is‚Ä¶

This place is AMAZING!! It was my husband and I‚Äôs first time at this location.

Muhammad (the store manager ) gave us great suggestions to their menu and gave us great energy from the minute we walked in to when we left. He always checked in to make sure everything was to our liking.
The server who waited our table was super sweet and attentive. Her customer service was BEYOND and she made sure to have everything we needed on our table without us asking a thing.

The location was clean and easy to navigate. We sat outside in the back and it was super cute and cozy.

THE FOOD THOUGH??? My Goodness was the food good. We had one of the Boils with lobster, snow crab, shrimp, corn and a side of Rockefeller Oysters. The seasoning was rich and seeped all through the food,  everything was fresh and the quantity of food was just right for two people. Even the white rice was moist. I could have eaten that by itself!

End of story. We WILL be back. Thank you Bay Ridge Fish Market for a great experience and some great food.

Everything is so good! Love being able to choose the fish, freshly displayed & can have it cooked on the spot. Enjoyed amazing fish tacos & an incredible lobster roll. The fries were great too. The owner Mohammed is attentive & wants to make sure the customer is happy. And we were! A neighborhood gem for sure!

First of all I drove all the way from sheepshead bay to bay ridge to get these amazing shrimp tacos also the seafood boil. But decided that I will do the boil next time. Didn't know that I was getting fries with my tacos, again amazing with‚Ä¶

Major shout out to my husband Coach Ray who went straight from coaching his baseball game to pick up a seafood boil for me. That is real love. He got there around 7:15 pm and even though the food was not ready until almost 9, he said the staff was upfront about the wait and offered him a salad and drinks on the house to make him comfortable. When I called earlier to check if they had seafood boils, they were just as kind and honest on the phone.

We live near Brooklyn College and the moment he walked through the door, the aroma of fresh seafood took over the house. He brought back a full spread: lobster roll, shrimp linguine, lobster mac and cheese, and of course my seafood boil. He works remote so he is all set for tomorrow and Tuesday The shrimp were cleaned on both sides which I truly appreciate. The butter sauce was flavorful and the best part is nothing was salty. The corn was grilled which added an extra layer of flavor. I fully expected the lobster tail to be overcooked because that tends to happen in boils but it was actually perfect. Sometimes when you get cooked seafood to go and it‚Äôs not as hot anymore, it can lose some of the flavor but this didn‚Äôt.

The food hits and I am grateful for both the service and my husband‚Äôs patience. Great customer care really makes all the difference. I will definitely be heading over there myself next time. This was a perfect way to end the weekend.

IF YOU HAVENT ALREADY THIS PLACE IS A MUST !!!!! DONT WALK RUNNNN!! THE FOOD IS SEASONED, COOKED AND PREPARED TO PERFECTION!!!! NOTHING IS OVER OR UNDER COOKED & SEASONED!!! EVERYTHING IS FRESHHHHHHHHHHHHH MADE WITH LOVE! THE STAFF IS AWESOME VOCAL & ATTENTIVE !!! GET DOWN THERE ASAP EVERYTHING THAT I ORDERED WAS HEAVENLY!!!!!! NO COMPLAINTS!!!!! AWESOME SERVICE, CLEAN & COMFORTING ENVIRONMENT!!! THESE GUYS MADE MY FIRST VISIT EXCELLENT!!! BEST SEAFOOD IVE HAD IN A WHILE!!! STOP BY AND ENJOY !!!!! START OFF WITH THE CLAM CHOWDER!!!!!!

If you're on the hunt for a seafood paradise, look no further than Bay Ridge Fish Market! My recent visit was nothing short of extraordinary, with the King Crab Legs stealing the show. These succulent delights were so delicious they practically melted in my mouth, leaving me craving more with every bite.

But the culinary magic didn't stop there. The baked clams were a revelation, perfectly seasoned and cooked to perfection. Each clam was a bite of oceanic bliss. And let's not forget the fish tacos, which were an explosion of flavors wrapped in a soft tortilla. Even though I don‚Äôt really like fish tacos. Simply put, they were some of the best I've ever tasted.

I wish I could share more photos of this incredible feast, but the food was so irresistibly delicious that I couldn't pause to capture it all. Bay Ridge Fish Market is a must-visit for any seafood lover, offering a dining experience that tantalizes every taste bud. Highly recommend!

Traveled all the way from Detroit to eat here. The service was just as great as the food. The shrimp po‚Äôboy was hands down one of the best I‚Äôve ever eaten. They‚Äôve only been open for 6 months, show them some love if you‚Äôre ever in the area. üî•‚Ä¶

Best restaurant in bay ridge! I can not express enough how delicious everything here is! It‚Äôs a hidden gem in bay ridge! I‚Äôve ordered multiple times for me and my family and we are always satisfied! Their lobster roll is fresh and delicious and literally stuffed with so much lobster! The handcut fries are phenomenal! The chicken parm is my favorite! They also make a really good shrimp parm! The burger deluxe has an old school vibe to it. A very large portion and satisfying! The ribeye steak dinner is $30 for a huge steak and sides and not lacking in quality, very tasty! You can‚Äôt find that price anywhere! During thanksgiving they made unbelievable turkey dinners and sandwiches! The turkey had lots of flavor and the mashed potatoes and gravy was delicious! Their portions sizes are very large and they always send lots of sauces for you to try! I recommend this place 100% and my friends and family love it here! The owner is very kind and his chef is very talented! Must give this place a try!

The restaurant/market is located in the Bay Ridge section of Brooklyn.  They prepare seafood cuisine.  They sell various soups, sandwiches and poke bowls.  Customers can purchase fish and other items to prepare for themselves.  The‚Ä¶

The food is excellent. I got the lobster roll which was filled to the brim. High quality and super tender. My mom got the fish tacos, excellent as well. Everything tastes super fresh! Mohamed the owner is extremely nice! Give them a try if you haven‚Äôt already

Obsessed with this place! Their selection of seafood is excellent and it is always so fresh and delicious! Highly recommend their seafood linguine! 10/10!! And the staff is so helpful and friendly! Love bay ridge fish market!

I searched for raw bar in bay ridge and this spot came up so I decided to give it a shot. This place is unbelievable and it‚Äôs in my neighborhood! I ordered 2 dozen (yes 2 dozen) cherry stone clams and they were super fresh! Also had a chance to chat with owner Mohammed and he‚Äôs a gentleman. Will  return soon!

Omg the aroma in this place to die for. Everything is fresh. And you no fresh cost money. But amazing food. Fast pace. Not too crowded. The phone is ringing. If your looking for a place to get snow crab. Soft shell crabs. Whole lobester. Fresh Bronszino you name it. If fish is your jam. This is the spot for you.

This spot is so lovely. Very clean. Lovely little garden in the back. I had the fried shrimp basket and the calamari. It was fresh and flavorful. Im hoping for some plant-based options in future as well. I understand the menu is still developing. Some beautiful salads and portobello burgers would be awesome!

Update: My wife and I came here unplanned. We were not disappointed. We ordered the fish and chips and the salmon burger. Mo treated us so kindly and he is very enthusiastic about the future of the store, his IG page, and most of all... The food! I have to try different things, but it's hard when the fish and chips just hits right.

We'll be back soon Mo!

Original: Will update at a future time. Food was good and fresh. Definitely coming back.

Definitely a hidden seafood gem üíé in the borough of Brooklyn I don‚Äôt have to travel to Queens for the experience very friendly staff very accommodating..
service was excellent food was delicious definitely a straight Situation this establishment gets a recommendation from me‚Ä¶

Everything was delicious!! Star of the show was the octopus charred, Lobster roll, and Grilled Branzino. It‚Äôs literally how they call it, a fish market, but you picked the seafood and they make it fresh right there in the open kitchen, they‚Ä¶
We came here for oysters and also ended ordering some shrimps whit crab, the service was outstanding and attentive, the food delicious
Amazing fresh food. The fish tacos were mouth watery and the lobster lasagna melts in your mouth. Should be a full fledged restaurant imo.
This place is great and the food is delicious. Beautiful and clean, quick service & food arrives nice and hot! Shrimp tacos and lobster roll were amazing.

This Fishbar was recently sold and the new owners are committed to expanding their food offerings. The restaurant now serves fresh clam chowder and will customize their menu upon request. Today i ordered a combo fried shrimp/calamari dish with pasta and manhattan clam chowder. This combo dish was not on the menu but the owner (Mohomed) was very gracious and willing to accomodate my craving. They also brought me a mini salad with italian bread to have with the pasta. They added some edamame beans to the salad after hearing I loved them. Now that‚Äôs great service üòÅ Everything was fresh, delicious and surprisingly affordable! There‚Äôs a lovely garden in the back for diners to enjoy. The owner told me they are hoping to make some enhancements so diners can enjoy the garden space during the winter months as well. They are also in the process of diversifying their menu offerings by adding plant-based dishes for non-meat eaters! I was so thrilled to hear that. Its always wonderful to have options, so thank you Fishbar for striving to create a menu that appeals to multiple culinary palates!

Bay Ridge Fishbar is an absolutely excellent establishment. The owners and staff truly go above and beyond. They‚Äôre so welcoming, kind, and truly knowledgeable. The quality of the seafood here is amazing & so fresh! Purchase salmon and you won‚Äôt be disappointed I promise. They also offer poke bowls and a selection of tasty grab and go items like shrimp and bacon macaroni & cheese, baked clams, shrimp cocktail, and other put together meals. What really makes them wonderful though is the fact that in addition to a seafood market, they‚Äôre also a small restaurant with shaded outdoor seating offering classics like fish & chips and lobster rolls which they will quickly cook up for you. Truly the best fish and chips I‚Äôve had in Brooklyn and all their pricing I‚Äôd incredibly fair for the quality. I couldn‚Äôt recommend them more!

Right as you walk in there‚Äôs fresh seafood waiting for you. I was greeted immediately  with a friendly face. Because I follow them on Instagram I ordered their special they highlighted for that Sunday: a shrimp burrito. Hubs got the lobster roll and we grabbed a seat outside in the back. We regretted the decision only because it was colder than we thought and my sweater was not doing its job. My guy kept us updated on our food and apologized for the wait but it was so understandable cuz there was a cute (birthday?) party and the kitchen was hustling to get their orders in. It‚Äôs a small-ish space; party table in the back for about 6, table in front for 2, bar stools by the register for 4, and outdoor seating could be for about 10. But when we wanted to move, they made sure to clear the table and have it ready. Service is so attentive and kind that it felt rare.
Okay, the FOOD: that lobster roll was at capacity and the fries were perfect. The shrimp burrito had shrimp in nearly every bite. The size was enough where I could finish but also feel stuffed but also could walk. We couldn‚Äôt stop there. We had to take home some appetizers that they have prepared in the fridge. While their homemade hummus looked gorgeous, we opted for mac and cheese and the crab empanadas. I also had some pieces of salmon broiled. All this seafood and a couple of drinks came out to be under $100. I‚Äôll definitely be back!

I came here for lunch with a friend who insisted they had a lovely backyard. Even on a very hot day, the shaded seating area was very comfortable. Food was fresh and delicious. The whole facility had a very clean and bright feel. The vibes were extremely friendly, welcoming & genuine. I would absolutely recommend.

My first order; lobster bisque and crab cheese sticks. Delicious. The bisque was the best I‚Äôve had and I‚Äôve had lots. So well prepared. Wish I had ordered four! Crab cheese sticks elevated by real crabmeat - so tasty. Will order again and even better make a trip to their restaurant.

We love the bay ridge fishbar! Their menu and atmosphere are phenomenal. When you enter, you feel like you‚Äôre transported to the chillest seafood establishment, with everything fresh and on display to see. There‚Äôs a quality of home that‚Ä¶

This fish market is more than just a place to grab some fish. You have to try the shrimp tacos, it‚Äôs amazing. And the Alfredo? Don't even get me started. It's so rich and creamy, Definitely recommend this spot.

We went on Christmas Eve, service is warm and friendly on the phone and in person. Moe gave us free shrimp rice balls as an appetizer. My lobster fra diavlo was delicious and a generous portion. The lobster was tender and sweet, the sauce just the right spiciness. The only criticism I can come up with is, that the menu listed clams and mussels in my dish and there weren‚Äôt any. Still it was more than I could finish in one sitting and I took some home. My son had a poke bowl, he enjoyed ordering unlimited toppings. I recommend this fresh seafood place.I suspect that the cooked entrees may be preferable to the sushi, I usually only get sushi at sushi restaurants

My wife and I went there for a late lunch, early dinner. There is a new owner. Let me assure you that the food is still exceptional!!!  We started we fried calamari. It was delicious. Freshly fried served with tomato sauce and lemon wedges.  A must try.
Next we clam chowder soup.  Very very good. Finally we shared a shrimp Bo boy sandwich.  The shrimp were gigantic and perfectly fried.
Considering the quality, the prices are very good.
We will be back!!
